thread.title: Three teens arrested after ‘half-naked girl, 15, is killed in suspected satanic ritual which saw her stabbed in eye with a broom’
thread.title_full: Three teens arrested after ‘half-naked girl, 15, is killed in suspected satanic ritual which saw her stabbed in eye with a broom’

author: lburnip
title: Three teens arrested after ‘half-naked girl, 15, is killed in suspected satanic ritual which saw her stabbed in eye with a broom’
text:
Opinion SATANIC ‘MURDER’ Three teens arrested after ‘half-naked girl, 15, is killed in suspected satanic ritual which saw her stabbed in eye with a broom’ 
Jessica Valeria was found brutally beaten to death with the "stake" through her eye By LAURA BURNIP Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A 15-YEAR-OLD killed after having a wooden stake plunged into her eye could have been attacked in a bizarre satanic ritual, police sources claim. 
Jessica Valeria was found half-naked and brutally beaten with a wooden broomstick embedded in her right eye in Torreon in the northern state of Coahuila, Mexico. CEN 1 Jessica Valeria, 15, was found brutally beaten with a wooden broomstick through her eye behind a house in Torreon, northern Mexico 
Sources close to the investigation told Vanguardia there were indications it could have been a satanic rite – but the Attorney General’s Office denied it was probing that line specifically. 
Three 17-year-olds – two boys and one girl – have been arrested in connection with the horror attack last Satudray in the Loma Real colony. 
A source told Vanguardia: “From the beginning were found indications of what could be a satanic rite as the motive of crime. 
“The victim presented very strong blows mainly in the face and the mortal blow was forceful, with extreme violence. 
“Apparently some marks on the body, in addition to other elements, lead to it was in an act of this type (satanic). 
“But everything is an assumption, that’s why the investigations are carried out. 
“It is an unfortunate case, very unfortunate. 
“It is now thought that even more people are involved in the satanic practices, in addition to the three detainees, regardless of whether or not they participated directly in the crime of Jessica Valeria.” 
It comes just months after three friends were accused of killing a restaurant worker they were allegedly trying to turn into a vampire during a satanic ceremony in Chihuahua, northern Mexico. RELATED STORIES Abused teen, who blogged about serial killers, shot abusive stepdad and stabbed mum 30 times SATANIST RAPE Devil worshipper with Baphomet tattoo on his forehead raped teen in shrine full of satanic posters and crammed with books on black magic after luring her from nightclub Apps-olute hell 'Possessed' teenagers found babbling incoherently after being driven mad by ‘Satanic’ WhatsApp messages 'THE DEVIL'S WORK' Man nearly had genitals cut off by boyfriend after row became 'satanic' torture DEVIL’S DANCE Inside the Los Angeles Satanic Temple's biggest-ever 'black mass' with blood-letting, demonic cats and, er, stand-up 
His body was found inside black bags with several blows to the face, and a wound in the neck, as well as other signs of suffocation. 
Another ritual death also took place in the city of Torreon in September 2016 when a pit bull dog was hanged by a cult. 
An expert warned “devil worship” is rife in the central American country, with many holding a fixation on vampires. 
Jessica’s body was found at around noon on February 7 in the back garden of a house in Herta de la Joya, a suburban area of the city. 
She was wearing just a blue shirt, but police said investigations show she had not been sexually abused. 
Police said they did not know why Jessica was at the house or whether she was taken there by force. 
But Gerardo Márquez, a delegate of the Attorney General’s Office of Justice of the State of Coahuila in Laguna (PGJEC), reportedly denied that the murder was part of a satanic ritual. 
He told El Siglo de Torreon : “We are not investigating that line specifically, the three young people who are involved in that fact are just like any other suspected criminal. 
“Maybe because of their way of dressing can be expected to assume something like that, but it has nothing to do.”
